The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Perhaps as the same as erethizo; properly, intrigue, i.e. faction.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: To disobey, rebel, be disloyal, refuse conformity. From apeithes; to disbelieve.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Passive - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: A primary verb; to convince; by analogy, to pacify or conciliate; reflexively or passively, to assent, to rely.
Injustice, unrighteousness, hurt. From adikos; injustice; morally, wrongfulness.
From oregomai; properly, desire, i.e., violent passion (justifiable) abhorrence); by implication punishment.
An outburst of passion, wrath. From thuo; passion.
